TopicTitle: IG works, now featuring only the best in half-best airplane production

Articles.Content:
The United Socialist Kerbal Republic or the USKR would like to be the first to proudly present only the latest in reverse engineered fighter jet and interceptors,

presenting from IG Works,

The IG 17

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/attachment.php?attachmentid=34481&stc=1&d=1349659425

The IG 21

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/attachment.php?attachmentid=34482&stc=1&d=1349659430

and a variant The IG Speeder, designed to break the pitiful land speed record set by the united states of kerbal,

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/attachment.php?attachmentid=34483&stc=1&d=1349659435

What shall come out of IG works next? only the USK spy satellites will know!

the 17 and 21 are very durable and easy to handle and they made it all the way to the second continent across the ocean from the runway with half a tank of gas left, its equipped with mechajeb to counter any roll just incase,

also the speeder requires a 180 degree turn off the runway to fully utilize it's power

Edited October 8, 2012 by PsychoLucario

Hi Psycho,

You can turn your IG Speeder craft 180 degrees in the SPH by selecting the cockpit and using A or D to turn it around. You'll need to mess with the canards after that as KSP redirects the lift for some reason.

I'm afraid I couldn't set a land speed record with it - at least not one where the pilot survived. It tumbled and crashed soon after activating the outside engines. Do you have any sort of user guide?

My own attempt is documented here. Top speed was 306 m/s.

Craft file for the XL-3: [ATTACH]34493[/ATTACH]

EDIT: Sadly failed to load the IG 17 and 21 due to missing part NP.Decouplerflange. Is NP NovaPunch? You may want to mention in your post which mods you're using and where to get them

Edited October 8, 2012 by Wayfare
